name: b25-27 first impression pants
notes:
knitted baby pants in rib in drops babymerino. size premature to 4 years. babydrops 25-27 pattern no bm-057-by; yarn group a

**size**: (premature) 0/1 - 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months (2 - 3/4) years
finished measurements:
waist: (36) 40-44-50-54 (56-60) cm/(14¼”) 15¾”-17¼”-19¾”-21¼” (22”-23½”)
full length: (28) 34-38-44-48 (54-60) cm/(11”) 13½”-15”-17¼”-19” (21¼”-23½”)
all measurements in chart in cm. 
note: because of the rib the garment will be very elastic and will stretch compared to the measurements in chart.

**materials**: 
drops baby merino from garnstudio
(100) 100-100-100-100 (150-150) g color no 28, light mint

drops double pointed needles and circular needle (40 or 60 cm/16” and 24”) size 3 mm/us 2.5 
drops circular needle (40 cm/16’’) size 2.5 mm/us 1.5 for edge.
